name: wordish
description: A correct-horse-battery-staple word generator... without a dictionary.

scripts.build: rm dist/*.js && npm run build:norm && npm run build:min && cd gh-pages && npm run build
scripts.build:dbg: browserify exports.js -u crypto  > dist/wordish.dbg.js && npm run build:norm && npm run build:min && cd gh-pages && npm run build

author: cmroanirgo
